definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: A band worn around the head.
The wind shall blow my top-knot off.
It never obeys barrettes or bands.
sentences.chinese: 它从来不听发夹和发带的话。

sentences.english: Sometimes people don't recognize you without the headband.
sentences.chinese: 你摘了发带会有人认不出你来。

sentences.english: Plz refer to actual photo, Hair band is different from model pict.
sentences.chinese: 请参考实物照片，发带是不同的。

sentences.english: The width as well as the color of the headband will have a great impact on your look.
sentences.chinese: 不同的发带宽度和颜色会有不同的效果。

sentences.english: The most visionary accessory designers send these stylish headbands down the market.
sentences.chinese: 最有远见的配件设计师把这些款式的发带推向了市场。

sentences.english: On the other hand you can wear it as you do the traditional headbands for a classy impression.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，你也可以用传统的发带营造优雅的形象。

sentences.english: Play is restarted with an indirect free-kick taken from where the hairband was thrown.
sentences.chinese: 在丢发带的地点以间接任意球重新开始比赛。

definition: Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
cape/shawl/(of long hair) to trail over one's shoulders
